Looking for a Ford Escape near Washington?

The Ford Escape offers appealing engines, decent cargo space, the option of all-wheel drive and a nice line of technology, such as a rear cargo door that opens automatically when a foot is waved under the bumper. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect Escape for you.

Autotrader has 195 Ford Escapes for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2001 Ford Escape 2WD XLS, a Used 2001 Ford Escape 2WD XLT, and a Used 2001 Ford Escape 4WD XLT.

Not sure if an Escape is the right fit for you?

That's okay! We make it easy to shop for your next vehicle by body type, mileage, price, and much more.You can find other popular Ford vehicles such as F150, F250, and Explorer on Autotrader.
